name: Ashes of Sombtir
description:
This is a retro, more traditional roleplaying game, the mechanics are a bit unforgiving but there is lots to do! Some of the main features include;

~ a branching story line,
~ battling mechanics,
~ multiple ways to traverse through areas, in addition to puzzles!

This game was originally a college project, before becoming a passion project :)
The game runs at 60fps and has an options menu when hitting the F5 key and a windowed/fullscreen selector with the F4 key
